title: Hollyoaks stars Nadine Mulkerrin and Rory Speed welcome baby boy
text:
Hollyoaks stars Nadine Mulkerrin and Rory Douglas-Speed are over the moon after welcoming their baby boy Reggie. Nadine, who plays Cleo McQueen in the soap, gave birth yesterday and Rory has since shared an adorable picture with his family on Instagram, praising Nadine.

Rory, best known as vicar Joel Dexter, enthused: ‘Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19. We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn’t think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour.

‘Women are seriously Superhuman x.’ (sic)

The copuple got together after meeting on set and recently became engaged. The love story began alongside the couple being together on screen and while Cleo and Joel have gone their separate ways, Nadine and Rory have gone from strength to strength.

Fans – and co-stars including Kieron Richardson and Sophie Porley – have been responding to the announcement with love and best wishes.

Advertisement

Advertisement

On screen, Cleo is currently in a relationship with Mitchell Deveraux (Imran Adams) but he is struggling with his conflicted feelings for Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) and his alter ego Anita Tinkle.

The pair have been seen conducting an affair and will be central to an upcoming stunt that will see them fighting for their lives – but will Cleo discover the truth?

Nadine will depart the show on screen very soon, having already left for maternity leave. It has not been confirmed if or when Nadine will reprise her role as Cleo and whether the door is being left open for a future return.

Meanwhile, things are busy for Rory on the soap too as he recently discovered the truth about Grace Black’s (Tamara Wall) accident. When Mercedes McQueen (Jennifer McQueen) is shot, Joel will be one of the main suspects.

Thank goodness things are much happier in real life! Congrulations to them all!
